ambitionBoxData.Title: Wtw Global Delivery And Solutions Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

Job Title: HR Analyst

Job Location: Vikhroli

Job Timing : US Shift Timing 6:30PM to 03:30AM


  • Collaborate with the early careers recruitment team on the following:
  • Sourcing
  • Register for campus career fairs, information sessions, etc. in collaboration with our early careers recruitment team
  • Keep track of all registered events that includes cost, dates, name of the event, and other helpful details in shared file
  • Assist in writing job descriptions and posting
  • Recruitment
  • Keep track of internal referrals
  • Reply back to candidate emails
  • Assist with candidate screenings
  • Interviews
  • Coordinate and schedule intern and graduate interviews as needed
  • Assist with building schedules, uploading documents, and creating assessor accounts in TopScore
  • Pull resumes for the program team as needed
  • Collect resumes of all new hires and compile it in a shared folder
  • Shared Document
  • Maintain recruitment data in shared file (candidate pipeline, acceptances, etc.)
  • Pre-Onboarding and Onboarding
  • Work with GHRS and IT on mass provisioning for new hire interns and graduates
  • Send out engagement/warm email
  • Assist with New Hire Orientations (Interns & Graduates)
  • Coordinate with Facilities on New Hire Start Date and Building Access/Information
  • Manage the day-to-day L&D email box
  • Forward queries as needed to the appropriate program team member (curriculum specialist, licensing, branding, communications, social media, recruitment, operations, program management, etc.)
  • Answer question from early career colleagues (interns, graduates, managers, etc.)
  • Managing Calendar
  • R&A Training Sessions
  • Speaker Series Sessions
  • L&D Onboarding Schedule
  • Summer Intern Program Events
  • Graduate Development Training schedule and GDP calendar
  • Manage L&D and Early Careers intranet sites
  • Ensure all materials are kept up to date
  • Make edits, updates, and changes as necessary
  • Process any data changes? (should we elaborate?)
  • Take Minutes on calls to ensure accurate follow-up/action plans
  • Assists in the preparation of various reports & surveys
  • Update PP decks for team
  • Assist with Terminations
  • J sist with coordinating year-end reviews/activities, comp statements J



Preferred candidate profile

Basic Qualifications

  • Excellent administrative and organizational skills with strong attention to detail
  • Solid understanding of Microsoft Office
  • Strong communication / interpersonal skills and ability to interact with staff at all levels
  • Ability to successfully manage and prioritize time-sensitive tasks and projects
  • Ability to use good judgment when interacting with external and internal contacts and performing job functions
  • Bachelors Degree required
  • Experience working in TopScore
  • Previous experience working in HR, Recruitment, Early Careers, etc.


Perks and benefits

Hybrid Work Model

Company Transportation Available

title: Freight Forwarding Executive
tagsAndSkills: Freight Forwarding,Shipment,Ocean Freight,Logistics Management,Shipping Line,Document Management,Freight,Shipping
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities:


  • Freight Forwarding Expertise: Manage and oversee all freight forwarding operations, ensuring compliance with international trade regulations and smooth handling of import/export documentation.
  • Documentation: Ensure all necessary documentation for freight forwarding, including bills of lading, invoices, and customs paperwork, is completed accurately and on time.
  • Client Relations: Conduct client meetings, both in-office and on-field, to understand their needs and ensure exceptional service delivery.
  • Team Management: Lead, mentor, and manage a team of professionals, ensuring high performance and efficient workflow.
  • Communication: Maintain clear and effective communication with clients, team members, and other stakeholders, both in the local language and English.
  • MS Office Proficiency: Utilize MS Office tools to manage documentation, reports, and presentations efficiently.
  • Problem-Solving: Address and resolve any issues or challenges that arise in the freight forwarding process promptly.
  • Go-Getter Attitude: Demonstrate a proactive approach to acquiring new clients and expanding the company's reach in the market.

title: Job | Senior Marketing Manager
tagsAndSkills: Marketing Management,Senior Marketing Manager,Senior,Marketing,Management
jobDescription:
Urgently required of Purchase Manager Location Malad (w), New Link Road, Mumbai

About Company : Our client into Manufacture and exporter high-quality soya ingredients from Non-GMO Indian soybeans to cater to the needs of a customer

Designation: Purchase Manager

Head office - Malad (w), New Link Road, Mumbai

1. Education: Any Commerce Graduate

2. Experience: Minimum 10 years in Purchase

3. Joining: Immediately/ At Earliest.

4. Salary Range: 9 to 14Lacs (as per current salary)

5. Preferably in Edible Oil Industry, Oleo Chemical Industry. or Chemical / Agro Manufacture and exporter industry

Job Profile

  • Checking purchase indent of the material.
  • Project Purchase of Equipment/Machinery etc.
  • Floating enquiry, collecting quotation, making comparative commercial and technical analysis, negotiating with different Supplier.
  • Taking continuous follow up with different Supplier for materials rate negotiation
  • Negotiate on pricing, setting up the frame contract and discount structure with Field Services/Installation for different vendors
  • After comparing quotation from all the vendors; finalizing and setting up the frame contracts
  • Checking the inventory in stock prior to making the purchase order
  • Monitoring the supplier performance, delivery, logistic
  • Taking follow up with Works / Store (Tarapur factory, Julwania Factory or site) till the order reaches and then, confirming receipt of material received by them
  • After discussing with the management and coordinating with the factory employees, taking the requirement and planning the purchases accordingly.
  • Continuously searching for new potential suppliers; negotiating with local and international suppliers and preparing a detailed database of potential suppliers inclusive of price comparisons and cost saving.
  • Responsible for making and updating a detailed list of all items purchased, inventory in stock along with cost and quantity.
  • Maintaining a detailed and update list of all items purchased and inventory with cost and quantity.
  • Preparing Vendor database for all the source-supplier/material.
  • Experienced and skilled in buying, negotiating, procuring the material on own the responsibility, handling all vendor purchases, maintenance and support contracts, and monitoring 3rd party provided services for all
  • Should Be Dynamic and Energetic and skilled enough to Finalize order.

Skills

  • Good oral and written communication skills
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Commercial awareness
  • The ability to make important decisions and cope with the pressure of demanding targets and tight deadlines
  • A confident and mature approach

If you are interested for the above referred position, kindly revert back with your Updated Resume along with following details:
1) Current salary
2) Expected salary

3) current designation
4) Notice period
5) Total experience
6) Current location
8) Reason for job change

9) DOB

E-mail Id: dhanashree@jobsearchindia.in
Contact Person: Dhanashree
Contact number: 8591939531

title: Software
tagsAndSkills: Java,rest,hibernate,springboot,soap,javascript,Software,Javas
jobDescription:
JOB DESCRIPTION


Our Purpose:

At Majesco, we believe in connecting people and business to Insurance in ways that are Innovative, Hyper-Relevant, Compelling and Personal. We bring together the brightest minds to build the future of Insurance; a world where Insurance makes life and business easier, more connected, and better protected.
If you are passionate about the power and possibilities that cloud technologies have unleashed and are looking to deliver transformative and innovative solutions that transform the customer experience, come join us!
Majesco is seeking a Full Stack Java Platform Developer for North American Life & Annuity product line. Majesco has been identified in the Visionary Quadrant as per Gartners report for L&A Product vendors in North America.

All About the Role:

  • Develop Quality software by practicing software engineering principles and best practices.
  • Embrace First Time Right, Automation, Reusability, Maintainability and Secure Coding in
    everyday work.
  • Design elegant solutions to meet the business process & requirements for the Product.
  • Create holistic designs for development using a Test-Driven Development approach to
    ensure reusability & extensibility of capabilities in the future versions.
  • Work with various stakeholders and identify the scope of the project, estimate-create a
    timeline, and come up with the approach and design for the features/epics.
  • Develop & implement architectural and design principles to improve performance, capacity,
    and scalability of product.
  • Take ownership while working in a SAFe Agile model with other developers, BAs, Architects
    to ensure that the end business & performance goals are met.
  • Independently drive the conversations with all internal and external stakeholders to ensure
    the software delivered meets the business objectives and with the highest quality.
  • Takes part in code reviews (self and team) and suggest/fix any defects/design issues
    identified.
  • Ensure On-Time delivery of product features as per the Product Roadmap.
  • Support issue analysis/triaging and provide fixes during test phases, as well as production
    issue resolution to ensure key Product SLAs are met.
  • Ensure thorough unit testing & participate in the transition of the application components
    to the testers.
  • Present and highlight features in product demos to wider audience / customer.
  • Document the architectural blueprint and end to end design through architecture, technical,
    user, troubleshooting, how to, etc. documents/guides.

What Youll Bring:


  • Self-driven, highly motivated, outcome focused - Ownership of technical designs, code
    development, and component test execution to demonstrate alignment to the functional &
    non-functional requirements.
  • First-time-right Quality mindset, prefers to automate over doing same tasks manually,
    strives for delivering the best customer experience, ambitious and growth mindset.
  • Employ exceptional problem-solving skills, with the ability to see and solve issues before
    they snowball into problems.
  • Excellent communication and organizational skills, and the ability to stay focused on
    completing tasks and meeting goals within a busy workspace.
  • Willing to work across time zones and with remote teams.

All About You:

  • Minimum 5 years of experience in Java technology stack, Spring, Spring Batch, Hibernate /
    JPA, JMS, DB/SQL, Unix - shell scripts, basic commands, web services software architecture
    and design (REST/SOAP), including security-based implementations
  • Minimum 5 years of experience on frontend framework - HTML5, React JS, Node JS,
    JavaScript, Angular
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in design patterns and framework/tool development
  • Minimum 3 years of experience of managing non-functional requirements (NFR) -
    performance, security, and availability.
  • Exposure to cloud applications including DevOps/DevSecOps, Scaling, Deployment and
    Automation; Cloud Exposure - MS Azure/AWS, OpenShift, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins,
    GitHub, Jira
  • Experience in other tools and technologies like Hazelcast, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark,
    Cassandra
  • Experience in Veracode or similar vulnerability analysis tool(s)
  • Experience with Opensource code

Other Qualifications:

  • Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or Engineering; Masters degree a plus • Experience
    with SAFe Agile Development practices and processes. SAFe Practitioner certification
    preferred.
  • Experience with the Majesco Platforms/Products is a plus
  • Preferred Experience in developing packaged software (Products) preferably in the banking
    or financial services areas.

title: Sales Support Executive
tagsAndSkills: Sales Report,Sales Activities,Sales Forecasting,Sales Administration,Sales Coordination,Operational Support,Sales Analytics,Reporting
jobDescription:
Job Description for Sales Support Executive”

  • Assist the sales team in managing customer inquiries, providing accurate product information, and helping with order processing.
  • Address customer inquiries, complaints, and issues promptly and professionally to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction.
  • Build and maintain positive relationships with customers, ensuring their needs are met effectively.
  • Collaborate with the sales team to prepare quotes, proposals, and contracts.
  • Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of sales activities, including customer interactions, orders, and payments.
  • Manage and organize sales documentation and contracts for easy access and retrieval.
  • Prepare regular sales reports and analyse data to identify sales trends and opportunities for growth.
  • Collaborate with logistics and finance teams to ensure smooth order fulfilment and customer satisfaction.
  • Support the sales team in achieving sales targets by providing necessary administrative and operational support.
